channel.title: MUN on Bao Tran Hoang
channel.description: Recent content in MUN on Bao Tran Hoang

item.title: My four-year journey at a glance
A Proud Mom
item.description: I arrived home at 10 p.m. on the final day of the three-day conference. I didnâ€™t cry, neither in the closing ceremony nor the dinner party, despite seeing many of my members failing to choke back their tears. Instead, I calmly slept for twelve hours to replenish my energy, getting myself ready for the upcoming post-event tasks. As the Deputy Secretary General, I long attached myself to the responsibility of remaining mentally strong on all occasions so that my members can always have a firm shoulder to lean on.
